results.title: Effects of metformin on congenital muscular dystrophy type 1A disease progression in mice: a gender impact study
results.text_hl: Yet, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ could be used as a supportive treatment that may improve many of the pathological symptoms in @<m>DISEASE_Craniometaphyseal_Dysplasia_Autosomal_Dominant</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C565145 @@@LAMA2-CMD@@@.
